title: Profile of Millennial travelers in the U.S. as of July 2016
yAxis: Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score
summary: This is a bar chart representing Profile Type in the x axis and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is appeared to be the highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
Profile Type Cultural interest has 1.27 times more Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score than Profile Type Price sensitivity which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
Profile Type Cultural interest has the highest Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score and Price sensitivity has the lowest Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Profile Type in the x axis and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is appeared to be the highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
Profile Type Cultural interest has 1.27 times more Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score than Profile Type Price sensitivity which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
There is a difference of 14.9 between the maximum Profile Type Cultural interest and minimum Profile Type Price sensitivity.
Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score at Profile Type Cultural interest is 70.3 , second place is Exploration hungry at 69.5, and thirdly is Food and cuisine driven traveler at 68.5.
The highest value 70.3 at Cultural interest is almost 1.11 times larger than the average value 63.36.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is 570.2 if we add up values of all Profile Types.

data.Profile Type: Wants the real destination not commercial tourism product
